=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Vijay Kedia’s Portfolio in CY25: Most stocks slide, 6 drop up to 68% — Are you impacted?
Source: Economic Times - Stocks
Published: 2025-12-27 09:25
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: stocks

Summary:
As per the latest available data for the September 2025 quarter, Kedia holds publicly disclosed stakes in around 16 companies, with a combined value of about Rs 1,170 crore as of December 26, 2025, down nearly 38% from Rs 1,896 crore in December 2024.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/markets/stocks/news/vijay-kedias-portfolio-in-cy25-most-stocks-slide-6-drop-up-to-68-are-you-impacted/slideshow/126202807.cms
